name: One-Bit Punch Man
description:
One-Bit Punch Man

This is it. The big one. The ultimate battle between good and evil.

How To Play:

  • You're the guy on the left.
  • Press [x] to punch.
  • Press [x] twice to punch twice.
  • Make sure you land your punch when their guard is down.
  • After you punch you drop your guard.
  • Force your opponent off the mat to win.
  • Be forced off the mat to lose.
